Test Name: California Virus (La Crosse) IgG and IgM, Serum
Purpose: To detect and quantify IgG and IgM antibodies against California Virus (La Crosse) in serum for diagnostic assessment of current or past infection.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: Microplate reader, incubator (37 Â°C), microplate washing system, pipettes
